_GEng_Sprite_ImageSet: Assigne an image object, or a part of it to a sprite
```GEng_Sprite.au3_GEng_Sprite_ImageSet(ByRef $hSprite, ByRef $hImage, $x = Default, $y = Default, $w = Default, $h = Default)```
_GEng_Sprite_ImageSetRect: Specifiy the part (rectangle) of the Image Object actually assigned to the Sprite that will be drawn
_GEng_Sprite_Draw: Draws a sprite at it's current position and angle
